V0217_01_00_00_0.text:
Hahaha!
You will perish by my hand!

V0217_01_00_01_0.text: I will rid the world of Duel Monsters - starting with you!

V0217_01_00_02_1.text: If you think you can change the future - prove it!

V0217_01_00_03_0.text: My deck contains the most powerful cards from every era!

V0217_01_00_04_0.text: If I don't change the future, the world will be destroyed.

V0217_01_00_04_1.text: That is why I traveled through time to come here!

V0217_01_00_05_0.text: Uniting Satellite and the City was a huge mistake, Yusei!

V0217_01_00_06_0.text:
Yusei!
Your Stardust Dragon will be mine!

V0217_01_00_07_0.text: If you can hear the spirits, they're saying your time is up.

V0217_01_00_08_0.text: If it's not Yugi Muto, the King of Games himself.

V0217_01_00_09_0.text: I am not afraid of you, Pharaoh!

V0217_01_00_10_0.text: I will show you everything I've learned!

V0217_01_00_11_0.text: Antinomy, all my research has led to this moment!

V0217_01_00_12_0.text: Aporia, allow me to share the results of my studies!

V0217_01_00_13_0.text: Z-one, I know how we can save the world together!

V0217_03_00_03_0.text: I know everything that your cards can do!

V0217_03_00_04_0.text: You will not take control of this Duel!

V0217_03_00_05_0.text: You may think you're playing well, but it's all an illusion!

V0217_05_00_00_0.text: Everything you believe is right is actually wrong!

V0217_06_01_02_0.text: That future will not come to pass!

V0217_07_09_00_0.text: I flip over my Set card!

V0217_11_01_00_0.text: I summon a monster in Defense Position!

V0217_11_07_00_0.text: You're not the only one who can Synchro Summon!

V0217_16_00_01_0.text:
You shall perish!
Along with all of Duel Monsters!

V0217_21_00_00_0.text: Your monsters are less than worthless against my Malefics!

V0217_21_00_01_0.text: I've seen the future - and it always ends with your defeat.

V0217_21_00_02_1.text:
There's no need to hesitate.
Attack me!

V0217_21_00_04_0.text: Is your sole purpose in life to annoy me?

V0217_21_00_05_0.text:
Impossible...
You avoided all my attacks!?

V0217_28_00_00_0.text:
Hahahaha!
Be gone!
Along with your era!

V0217_28_00_01_0.text: You and your world are coming to an end!

V0217_28_00_02_0.text: I will use what I learned to rewrite history.

V0217_28_00_03_0.text: Be proud that your sacrifice will change the future!

V0217_28_00_04_0.text:
Yusei!
You said that humans can change the future.

V0217_28_00_04_1.text: But there's nothing but despair for yours!

V0217_28_00_05_0.text: While your names may last throughout history, you will not!

V0217_28_00_06_0.text: I've gathered all the data we need!

V0217_28_00_06_1.text: Let's use this knowledge to save the future!

V0217_29_00_00_0.text: Are you saying that my analysis is wrong?

V0217_29_00_01_0.text:
This can't be...
How did you dodge all my attacks?

V0217_29_00_02_0.text: Duel Monsters have a power that even I know nothing of!

V0217_29_00_03_0.text: My research never said you could Duel like this!

V0217_29_00_04_0.text: A defeat is simply another data point for my investigation.

V0217_29_00_05_0.text: My method is simply one way to save the future.

V0217_29_00_05_1.text: If you have a different method - do it.

V0217_33_00_00_0.text: The future says that everything you believe in is wrong!

V0217_33_00_01_0.text: History has taught me what I must do!

V0217_33_00_02_0.text: You will be crushed by my grand design!

V0217_30_00_00_0.text: You traveled through time to confront me?

V0217_30_00_02_0.text:
Ahh...
So you're the King of Games.

V0217_34_00_00_0.text: Everything you think is right is actually wrong!

V0217_34_00_01_0.text: You don't realize that attack was a huge mistake!

V0217_34_00_02_0.text: I have the key card to victory in my hand!

V0217_34_00_03_0.text: I Special Summon Malefics by banishing the originals.

V0217_34_00_04_0.text: Just a small sacrifice for my master plan.

V0217_34_00_06_0.text: I know everything that your cards can do.

V0217_34_00_07_0.text: I had to do nothing to make you reveal your weakness.

V0217_34_00_08_0.text:
Oh, I'm losing?
Hahaha.
Is that how it looks to you?

V0217_35_00_00_0.text:
I'm Paradox.
You don't know me - for I'm not from your time.

V0217_35_00_01_0.text: I've come from the future to rid the cause of my suffering.

V0217_36_00_00_0.text: Bring our operation to an end!

V0217_36_00_02_0.text: My sacrifice will fuel our victory.

V0217_08_00_00_0.text: I activate the Quick-Play Spell, Malefic Divide!

V0217_08_00_00_1.text: I resurrect a Malefic monster until the end of this turn!

V0217_08_00_01_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Malefic Selector!

V0217_08_00_01_1.text: I banish two Malefic cards to acquire two new Malefic cards!

V0217_08_00_02_0.text:
I activate my Continuous Spell!
Malefic Territory!

V0217_08_00_03_0.text:
I activate my Field Spell!
Welcome to Malefic World!

V0217_08_00_04_1.text: Instead of drawing, I get a random Malefic card!

V0217_08_00_05_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Malefic Claw Stream!

V0217_08_00_05_1.text: It destroys one of your monsters!

V0217_08_00_06_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Malefic Tune!

V0217_08_00_06_1.text: When a Malefic is destroyed, I draw two cards from my deck!

V0217_08_00_07_0.text: Malefic Tune's effect activates from my Graveyard!

V0217_08_00_07_1.text: I banish it to add a Malefic monster in my deck to my hand!

V0217_09_00_00_0.text: I offer up my LP to Special Summon Malefic Truth Dragon!

V0217_09_00_01_1.text: All your face-up monsters are destroyed!

V0217_09_00_02_0.text: I give up a Malefic card to power Malefic Paradigm Dragon!

V0217_09_00_03_1.text: When it's Synchro Summoned, it revives a Synchro Monster!

V0217_09_00_04_0.text: I activate Malefic Paradox Gear's effect!

V0217_09_00_05_0.text: Stardust Dragon's effect will negate and destroy that card!

V0217_13_00_00_0.text:
Clear the way for the all mighty!
Malefic Truth Dragon!

V0217_37_00_00_0.text: Witness how the darkness pools together to create pure evil!

V0217_13_00_04_0.text: The Tuner Monster, Malefic Parallel Gear!

V0217_13_00_07_0.text:
Let's go!
Malefic Cyber End Dragon!

V0217_13_00_11_0.text:
Join me!
Malefic Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

V0217_13_00_13_0.text: Feast your eyes on Malefic Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

V0217_19_00_13_0.text: Take them down, Malefic Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

V0217_26_00_01_0.text: That won't stop me from winning!
